I figured out a way to demonstrate how turbulence forms plastic concentration depth profiles in rivers. White plastic particles are more dense than water, blue are same density, green are less dense. Shake the jar to add turbulence and watch them form. #PlasticPollution https://t.co/DrKMcgUhdf
